column.name: AlertType
column.summary: Enum:AlertType Identifies what types of alert this row is associated to.

Enumeration.name: AlertType
Enumeration.EnumValue: 36 - Alert if a clinic is not signed for eConfirmations but is trying to use the AddToCalendar tag. FKey on this alert type is used to determine the type of autocomm that created this alert rather than a FKey to a db row.

column.name: Type
column.summary: Enum:AlertType Identifies what type of alert this row is.

Enumeration.name: AlertType
Enumeration.EnumValue: 36 - Alert if a clinic is not signed for eConfirmations but is trying to use the AddToCalendar tag. FKey on this alert type is used to determine the type of autocomm that created this alert rather than a FKey to a db row.

column.name: FormToOpen
column.summary: Enum:FormType The form to open when the user clicks "Open Form".

Enumeration.name: FormType
Enumeration.EnumValue: 2 - FormOnlinePayments.
18 - FormEServicesAutoMsging

column.name: AutoCommExcludeDateNum
column.summary: Primary key.

column.name: ClinicNum
column.summary: ClinicNum this row applies to. 0 for HQ

column.name: LogSource
column.summary: Enum:LogSources

Enumeration.name: LogSources
Enumeration.summary: Known entities that create security logs.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 24 - Indicates that a claim was automatically received.

column.name: EServiceAction
column.summary: Enum:eServiceAction

Enumeration.name: eServiceAction
Enumeration.EnumValue: 64 - EClipboard - BYOD 6 Digit validation page reached
65 - EClipboard - BYOD 6 Digit validation failed
66 - EClipboard - BYOD 6 Digit validation success
67 - EClipboard - 2 Factor Auth Screen Shown
68 - EClipboard - 2 Factor Auth Close Clicked
69 - EClipboard - 2 Factor Auth Email Selected
70 - EClipboard - 2 Factor Auth Text Selected
71 - EClipboard - 2 Factor Auth Code Submitted
72 - EClipboard - 2 Factor Auth Code Success
73 - EClipboard - 2 Factor Auth Code Fail
68 - EClipboard - patient opens payment page. Note should indicate where it is opened from
69 - EClipboard - User tapped "Add Card"
70 - EClipboard - User tapped 'Done' on credit card manage page
71 - EClipboard - User removed a credit card
72 - EClipboard - User made payment with new credit card
73 - EClipboard - User made payment with existing credit card
74 - EClipboard - User tapped cancel when making a payment
75 - EClipboard - Error: Delete card not found
76 - EClipboard - Error: Delete credit card patnum does not match current patnum
77 - EClipboard - Error: Delete credit card invalid alias
78 - EClipboard - Error: Delete credit card patient not found
79 - EClipboard - Error: error making payment
80 - EClipboard - Error: Making Payment, patient not found
81 - EClipboard - Error: Making Payment, invalid amount

column.name: PermType
column.summary: Enum:Permissions Some permissions will treat a zero FKey differently. Some denote it as having access to everything for that PermType. I.e. Reports.

Enumeration.name: Permissions
Enumeration.summary: A hard-coded list of permissions which may be granted to usergroups.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 223 - Allows user to export statements as CSV files.
224 - Allows users to edit carriers.
234 - Allows the editing of customer accounts for the ODApi via the BCM.
235 - Logs when registration keys are created. For audit trails only.
236 - Logs when registration keys are edited. For audit trails only.

column.name: InsPlansZeroWriteOffsOnAnnualMaxOverride
column.summary: Overrides the InsPlansZeroWriteOffsOnAnnualMax preference. 0=use default, 1=true, 2=false.

column.name: InsPlansZeroWriteOffsOnFreqOrAgingOverride
column.summary: Overrides the InsPlansZeroWriteOffsOnFreqOrAging preference. 0=use default, 1=true, 2=false.

column.name: UserNum
column.summary: FK to userod.UserNum. Indicates which user is currently logged into the device. 0 indicates this device is not logged into.

column.name: ActionType
column.summary: Enum:eActionType Stores the intended action associated to this rows data.

Enumeration.name: eActionType
Enumeration.summary: Actions representing different endpoints in mobile app.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 5 - Used by eClilpboard to fill out exam sheets.

column.name: SecDateEntry
column.summary: Timestamp automatically generated and user not allowed to change. The actual date and time of entry.

column.summary: Enum:Permissions

234 - Allows the editing of customer accounts for the ODApi via the BCM.
235 - Logs when registration keys are created. For audit trails only.

column.name: LogSource
column.summary: Enum:LogSources None, WebSched, InsPlanImport834, FHIR, PatientPortal.

Enumeration.name: LogSources
Enumeration.summary: Known entities that create security logs.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 24 - Indicates that a claim was automatically received.

column.name: CanElectronicallySign
column.summary: When true, allows a user to sign a signature box electronically.

column.name: IsSigProvRestricted
column.summary: When true, only allows the signature box to be signed by a provider.
